title: [Dynamic Regions] tikv panic when using tiflash
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
[2023/05/15 15:37:32.736 +08:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:88](http://lib.rs:88/)] ["Welcome to TiKV"]
[2023/05/15 15:37:32.737 +08:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:93](http://lib.rs:93/)] ["Release Version:   7.2.0-alpha"]
[2023/05/15 15:37:32.737 +08:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:93](http://lib.rs:93/)] ["Edition:           Community"]
[2023/05/15 15:37:32.737 +08:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:93](http://lib.rs:93/)] ["Git Commit Hash:   761de11487fc19558b700c63e41cd9fcb32a6995"]
[2023/05/15 15:37:32.737 +08:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:93](http://lib.rs:93/)] ["Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v7.2.0-alpha"]
[2023/05/15 15:37:32.737 +08:00] [INFO] [[lib.rs:93](http://lib.rs:93/)] ["UTC Build Time:    Unknown (env var does not exist when building)"]
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
deploy with tiflash and run some common workload
